Contact Us

EMPLOYEE ENGAGEMENT

WHY CHOOSE US

SHOWREEL

TESTIMONIALS

NEW

Engaging Smiles

A Smile Foundation Initiative

EMPLOYEE ENGAGEMENT & DOING GOOD

  • Employee engagement is imperative as it helps to increase the productivity of employees, improve the quality of work and help in the retention of dedicated and committed employees, becoming a driving factor in the success of an organization. To keep your employees engaged you need to make them a part of your organization’s vision, mission and ethos. The social commitment of an organization, the larger purpose that an employee can fulfill while doing her/his job, is powerful and can be implemented through corporate employee engagement ideas.
  • Smile Foundation, India’s leading development organization working for the welfare of children and families brings you an opportunity to tie engagement with purpose and help your employees get a wholesome experience of being committed to a cause. Choose a special occasion that you would want to celebrate with our children, and leave the rest to us! Backed by years of experience in making these programs memorable for the children and rewarding for you, Smile Foundation prepares, coordinates and executes all the aspects of employee engagement programmes, including logistic support.

Companies with engaged employees outperform those without by up to 20%

(Source: Gallup Employee Engagement Survey )

88% of employers believe that effective employee engagement programs help attract and retain employees

(Source: According to America’s Charities Snapshot Employer Research)

58% of employees consider a company’s social and environmental commitments while deciding where to work

(Source: The Cone Communications Employee Engagement Study)

55% employees would choose to work for a socially responsible company even if the salary isn’t as per their expectation

Ways of engagement

Ways of engagement

new events

Celebrate Joy of Goodness this Christmas & New Year

This festive season, wear your Santa hat, decorate the tree, and share love through carols and activities with our children from Mission Education. Help them dream, grow, and become compassionate souls like you.

  • salony.pandya@smilefoundation.email
  • 9999180854
Know More

Celebrate International Volunteering Day with us!

Join the team that spreads smiles—celebrate International Volunteering Day with us! Engage in impactful activities like Build a Bike, Art & Craft, Storytelling, and more with children from our Mission Education Program.

  • salony.pandya@smilefoundation.email
  • 9999180854
Know more

Empower Children with a Playground of Opportunities

Your childhood memories today can be someone’s learning. Celebrate Children’s Day Mela with Smile Foundation. Participate in fun games, interactive stalls, and talent shows to empower young minds to dream beyond classrooms.

  • bd.corporate@smilefoundation.email
  • 8595796767
Know more

Participate to Spread Smiles this DaanUtsav

DaanUtsav- India’s Biggest celebration of Kindness is just around the corner and Smile Foundation is thrilled to invite your team to celebrate this festive spirit as “Season of Smiles” by empowering innocent children.

  • bd.corporate@smilefoundation.email
  • 8595796767
Know more

Celebrate Joy of Goodness this Christmas & New Year

This Christmas and New Year, inspire your team to spread joy by wearing their Santa hats! And make the wishes of children from our education centres come true. Join us in tree decoration, enjoy soulful carols and performances, and showcase your skills in an art and craft competition.

  • salony.pandya@smilefoundation.email
  • 9999180854
Know More

Be a Part of the Team that Spreads Smiles - Celebrate International Volunteering Day with us!

Join the team that spreads smiles—celebrate International Volunteering Day with us! Engage in impactful activities like Build a Bike, Art & Craft, Storytelling, and more with children from our Mission Education Program. Volunteer with us to make a positive, lasting change that inspires.

  • salony.pandya@smilefoundation.email
  • 9999180854
Know more

Participate to Spread Smiles this DaanUtsav

DaanUtsav- India’s Biggest celebration of Kindness is just around the corner and Smile Foundation is thrilled to invite your team to celebrate this festive spirit as “Season of Smiles” by empowering innocent children.

  • bd.corporate@smilefoundation.email
  • 8595796767
Know more

Employee engagement ideas

Physical
Virtual

employee engagement ideas

OUR PARTNERS

EMPLOYEE EXPERIENCES

Smile Foundation team will help you curate the best possible corporate employee engagement activities that are aligned with your mission, employee interest, geography requirements and budget. Our corporate engagement ideas are bound to make your employees feel special and deeply involved in important social causes. 

Neha Dabral, Employee, Avery Dennison

These girls are now my dose of motivation. We all keep complaining about our lives, but each one of these girls is truly fighting a battle with big smiles on their faces. It felt so good to spend a day with them. I came to encourage, and went back inspired! I feel proud to be associated with Avery Dennison where we get such wonderful chances to do some good in our own little ways. 

Employee, Adobe India

We picked up this initiative with Smile Foundation wherein we realised that a lot of children who commute to school stay pretty far away from it. So, we came up with this unique idea of donating bicycles to children. It was amazing.  Big Thanks to Adobe and Smile Foundation for this touching experience

Watch Video

Kabir Shakir Ahmed, CFO, Microsoft India

Spending time with these children reminds me that intelligence, ability and dreams are not chosen for just a few. These children prove that they are special and they are clearly the bright future of India.

Watch Video
